structured_content.text: Report of Committee on Finance regarding the State Treasury, [16 February 1837]1

The committee on Finance, who were required by a resolution to ascertain the amount
               of money annually receivable into the State Treasury by opperation of the existing revenue^laws^; and also, the amount necessary to meet^the^current expenses of the government,  report:
The different items, forming the above amount of money are as follow (viz)
